Many thanks to our contributors and devs.

Changelog:

Whonix 16.0.0.8 (Debian 11 bullseye based) - for VirtualBox - Major Release - Testers Wanted! News
Testers Wanted! Download the Testers-Only version of Whonix for VirtualBox: Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Release Upgrade Whonix 15 to Whonix 16 instructions. This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix! Please Donate! Please Contribute! Major Changes ported Debian base from Debian 10 buster to Debian 11 bullseye (discussion) switched back from deb.torproject.org tor package to packages.debian.org stab…

Some additional changes involving dracut were added on top for this release tag.
